title: Expand GDD Section: Competition & Market Dynamics (shared market, AI rivals, rankings, auctions, Cherry Festival)

requirements.text: Update the GDD template section "Competition & Market Dynamics" (id: `competition-mechanics`) in `frontend/src/lib/gddTemplate.ts` to explicitly include and clearly describe: (1) shared market mechanics showing how combined player+AI supply impacts retail/wholesale prices; (2) AI competitor behavior patterns for the three rival personalities (Traditionalist, Innovator, Businessman) beyond brief labels (i.e., their decision priorities and how they react to prices/events); (3) a ranking system definition that includes Farm Value, Season Profit, and Efficiency metrics (and how each is calculated at a high level); (4) auction-based wholesale contracts (how auctions run, bid logic at a design-spec level, contract duration/fulfillment, and how winning affects revenue/prices); and (5) Cherry Festival event mechanics (timing, objectives, scoring, rewards, and how it interacts with market prices and rankings). All user-facing text must be English.

quotes:
Please expand the "Competition & Market Dynamics" section to confirm it includes:
- Shared market mechanics (how player and AI supply affects prices)
- AI competitor behavior patterns (Traditionalist, Innovator, Businessman personalities)
- Ranking system (Farm value, Season profit, Efficiency metrics)
- Auction-based wholesale contracts
- Cherry Festival event mechanics

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/gddTemplate.ts` section with `id: 'competition-mechanics'` includes dedicated subsections (or clearly labeled paragraphs) for: Shared Market Mechanics, AI Competitor Behavior Patterns (Traditionalist/Innovator/Businessman), Ranking System (Farm Value / Season Profit / Efficiency), Auction-based Wholesale Contracts, and Cherry Festival mechanics.
Ranking metrics explicitly mention Farm Value, Season Profit, and Efficiency and provide high-level calculation definitions in the section content (not just a list item).

Auction-based wholesale contracts are described as an auction system (not a fixed-price sale), including at minimum: when auctions occur, what is bid on, how winners are selected, and what obligations/rewards the contract creates.

Cherry Festival is explicitly named "Cherry Festival" (not only "Harvest Festival") and includes mechanics (timing, goals, rewards) and at least one stated interaction with market prices and/or rankings.
GDD rendering pages continue to display the updated section without layout/markdown rendering regressions (no broken formatting in the accordion view or Markdown export).

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; no backend changes are required for this request.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not start Phase 2 canister schema implementation in Motoko as part of this change.
Do not introduce new backend APIs or persistence changes for competition systems; this is a GDD/spec text update only.
Do not redesign the UI; only update GDD template content.
